entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:03 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 6:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: WNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with a few flurries beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
